query: Create an n8n community node that wraps the JSONPlaceholder REST API. It should support getting a single post by ID, getting all posts, and creating a new post. Use the declarative style since it's a simple REST wrapper.
expected_behavior: Uses n8n-nodes-starter as the base template
Creates a declarative node with requestDefaults pointing to https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
Defines resource 'post' with operations: get, getAll, create
Each operation has routing.request with correct HTTP method and URL path
Uses displayOptions.show to conditionally display fields per operation
Includes noDataExpression: true on resource and operation selectors
Includes action field on each operation option
Creates a codex .node.json file with correct metadata
Creates proper package.json with n8n-nodes- prefix
Does NOT include an execute() method
Has correct naming: class name matches filename
baseline_without_skill: Agent may mix declarative and programmatic patterns, forget routing keys, use incorrect file structure, or omit required fields like action, noDataExpression, or codex file.
with_skill_expected: Agent produces a complete, correctly structured declarative node package with all required files, proper routing configuration, and follows n8n naming conventions.
